sentence.Network_en: One who lives very meagerly in order to hoard money.
sentence.Network_cn: 吝啬鬼为了积聚钱财而过着非常穷困生活的人.

sentence.Network_en: These voices are meagerly represented at the conference.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些意见在讨论会上没有得到重视.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 - 外国语 -... ... meager 兆 meagerly 瘦地 meagre 瘦的.
He used to live meagerly(贫弱地) and never had enough to eat and drink, dressed God knows how, exactly like a beggar, and always saved and put.

means.word_mean: 1. deficient in amount or quality or extent;
1. to a meager degree or in a meager manner;

sentences.sentence: "these voices are meagerly represented at the conference"
"the area is slenderly endowed with natural resources"
